name: Essentia Omnia
description:
Hello scholar of alchemy, you are about to embark on an expedition! Your goal - to figure out what alchemy is and how it works. Good luck!

Play the exe if you can, it runs better that way.

We are 5 folks developing our college capstone project, this is our videogame. Essentia Omnia is being worked on almost full time, things will change often. Feedback and reports of strange sightings are very much appreciated, click the ✉ in the corner and your words will be beamed directly into our skulls. Any and all donations will be irresponsibly spent on snacks. Follow to get notified of updates.
